description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 9 (Green Roof and Walls - VRC1 and EC1 Only) and full discharge of Condition 21 (Fire Statement) as attached to planning permission ref. 75111/APP/2022/1007 dated 21-09-2021 (Full planning permission for site clearance and preparation, including the demolition of remaining buildings, and the redevelopment of the site to provide three energy centres, two visitor reception centres, a new footpath and cycleway link to the canal towpath, works to the highway, car parking, cycle parking, associated infrastructure, enclosures and necessary physical security systems, hard and soft landscaping, and ancillary uses, as well as associated external works).
site_name: Land at Bulls Bridge Industrial Estate
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Please be advised that this application permits the partial discharge of Condition 9 (Green Roof and Walls) as attached to planning permission ref. 75111/APP/2022/1007 in relation to VRC1 and EC1 only. Further application submissions will be required to discharge Condition 9 for the remaining parts of the site.
This application also permits the full discharge of Condition 21 (Fire Statement) as attached to planning permission ref. 75111/APP/2022/1007.
